definition: to turn around/to look back/to recollect
to circle/to go back/to turn around/to answer/to return/to revolve/Hui ethnic group (Chinese Muslims)/time/classifier for acts of a play/section or chapter (of a classic book)
head/chief/first (occasion, thing etc)/classifier for poems, songs etc

sentences.english: Then when you get older and think back, you’ll be able to enjoy it a second time.
sentences.chinese: 當你年老回首往事時，便能再次享受你的一生。

sentences.english: A song is played back, the flower curtain.
sentences.chinese: 皆奏一楓曲，次年回首花謝幕。

sentences.english: Finally, it seems, Spain is ready to confront a horrifying aspect of its recent past.
sentences.chinese: 最終，西班牙似乎已準備面對其不堪回首的過往。

sentences.english: However, as seeing the past, we should realize what we get now is not easily come by.
sentences.chinese: 回首過往，方能讓人瞭解到眼前的得來不易。

sentences.english: Methods The data of39cases with appendiceal mass was analyzed retrospectively.
sentences.chinese: 方法回首分析我院闌尾炎性腫塊39例。

sentences.english: Edie looks back on their special friendship.
Trace of her thousands of Baidu, when I look back, that people in the lights at the Blue Coral.
sentences.chinese: 衆裏尋他千百度，驀然回首，那人卻在燈火藍珊處。

sentences.english: Palace maid dark cry, but looking back on the sand pedestrians.
sentences.chinese: 漢宮侍女暗垂淚，沙上行人卻回首。

sentences.english: In my life, there are thousands of time saying hi and goodbye.
sentences.chinese: 回首一生，數不清有多少次說哈羅和再見。

sentences.english: This, in retrospect, is the mistake the UK made.
sentences.chinese: 回首往事，這正是英國所犯的錯誤。

sentences.english: Look again at the favorite in my wandering among the gloomy serious away.
sentences.chinese: 又以最留戀的回首徘徊在我揮之離去的灰暗之中。

sentences.english: Thinking back to Rwanda memories arise that are truly unbearable to recall.
sentences.chinese: 又如盧安達，我們再回想，真的是不堪回首。

sentences.english: Looking back, footmarks are barely to be seen.
sentences.chinese: 回首走過的足跡，卻總是如此的模糊。

sentences.english: I look back on the way I was then a young stupid kid who committed that terrible crime.
sentences.chinese: 我回首前塵往事，那個犯下重罪的小笨蛋。

sentences.english: Yeah, so, first of all, it was interesting, you throwback to HP.
sentences.chinese: 你回首了惠普的往事，讓我深有感觸。

definition: (literary) to slip/(of looks etc) to fade away/(of time) to slip away/to squander (time, opportunities)/to dillydally
the passage of the years/the flow of time
the other end of the world/a faraway place
to come and go/to have friendly relations with/in the past/previous
to recall with emotion/to feel sentiments
